title: Polkadot Powers Up: Breakout Structure Signals A Bullish Week Ahead
body: In a recent market update, CryptonautX pointed out that Polkadot (DOT) is gaining notable bullish momentum as the new week begins. The analyst emphasized that DOT is not only showing strength in its price action but is also forming a well-defined breakout structure, signaling the potential for further upside. With momentum building and technical indicators aligning, DOT appears to be positioning for a strong move in the days ahead. Polkadot Gears Up For Potential Continuation Rally According to CryptonautX, Polkadot has broken out of its recent consolidation phase with a powerful upward push. This breakout reflects renewed market confidence and strength, as DOT gains momentum and challenges previous resistance levels that once halted its progress. Related Reading: Polkadot Isn‚Äôt Done Yet‚ÄîBreakout Point To Bigger Gains Ahead In addition, the market structure is steadily shifting in favor of the bulls, highlighted by a series of higher lows and solid daily candle formations. These technical signals suggest that buying pressure is steadily building, laying the groundwork for sustained upside movement if key levels are breached. As the new week unfolds, Polkadot is set to retest critical zones that could serve as launch points for continued bullish action. A successful hold or break above these areas may confirm the strength of the current trend and pave the way for higher targets in the near term. CryptonautX also noted that the rejection zones that previously capped DOT‚Äôs price are now being tested again, and this time with increased volume and greater conviction from buyers. This shift in sentiment and market activity indicates that bulls are gaining control, and DOT may be preparing for a strong continuation rally. DOT On Watch: Will Momentum Drive The Next Big Move? Furthermore, CryptonautX has declared that, if the current momentum holds, Polkadot could enter a fresh phase of accumulation followed by a strong expansion. The recent price action suggests that DOT is building the foundation for a more sustained rally, provided buyers maintain control in the coming sessions. Related Reading: Polkadot (DOT) Prints Classic Bullish Falling Wedge ‚Äì Big Breakout Imminent Adding to this bullish outlook is the continued strength of Polkadot‚Äôs ecosystem. CryptonautX highlighted that growing developer activity and fundamental progress within the network are reinforcing the technical setup, offering solid backing for a potential upward move. With both technical and fundamental factors aligning, the analyst urged traders to keep a close eye on DOT this week. A sharp and unexpected move to the upside could be on the horizon, potentially catching the market off guard. At the time of writing, DOT is trading at $3.62, with a market capitalization exceeding $5.8 billion and a 24-hour trading volume of over $185.4 million. DOT‚Äôs price has increased by 1.82% within the same time frame. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview.com

title: XRP Trading Volume Explodes. Multi-Million Dollars In 1 Minute¬†Worldwide
body: In a surprising turn of events, XRP recorded an extraordinary trading volume spike, with over $33 million traded in just one minute across global exchanges. This data was flagged by respected crypto analyst Xaif on X, capturing what appears to be a highly coordinated liquidity event. While XRP has seen significant trading bursts in the past, this latest surge stands out for its speed and scale, drawing immediate attention from the broader crypto community. Price Reaction: XRP Rallies Toward $3.03 The massive volume influx came amid a notable price rally. On August 4, 2025, XRP surged by nearly 6%, rising from approximately $2.83 to a daily high of $3.03, before settling near $3.00. This price movement aligned with a simultaneous explosion in trading volume, which surpassed 110 million XRP, more than double the token‚Äôs recent daily average. Meanwhile, there have been notable trading in XRP in spot market transactions on the day, equivalent to over $423 million in USDT. The correlation between the volume spike and upward price movement indicates strong buying pressure, likely led by institutional investors reacting to technical breakout levels. $XRP TRADING VOLUME EXPLODING! $33,000,000 MILLION TRADED in just 1 MINUTE ON GLOBE what‚Äôs going on?! pic.twitter.com/bJ3HiHI4J4 ‚Äî Xaif Crypto | (@Xaif_Crypto) August 4, 2025 Technical Momentum and Market Structure From a technical standpoint, XRP flashed strong bullish signals throughout the trading session. It successfully cleared multiple resistance levels at $2.87, $2.92, and $2.97 before encountering resistance at $3.03. This barrier triggered modest profit-taking, yet price action remained firm near local highs, demonstrating sustained market confidence. Momentum indicators reinforced the bullish structure. RSI(6) readings surged past 93, pushing deep into overbought territory, while short-term exponential moving averages (EMAs) stayed aligned in a bullish configuration. Despite these overheated signals, XRP‚Äôs price stability suggests that demand is being driven by conviction rather than hype. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Institutional Activity and Strategic Positioning Institutional traders are playing significant role in the day‚Äôs rally. Over $14 million in leveraged long positions were opened across major exchanges, indicating widespread confidence in XRP‚Äôs short-term trajectory. This follows a broader macro trend of increasing interest in XRP, particularly as traders anticipate potential regulatory developments and easing geopolitical risk. Xaif‚Äôs reference to the $33 million per-minute surge mirrors a similar flash event last month, when XRP experienced a $29 million burst, another clear indicator of strategic accumulation by whales and high-frequency trading bots. Looking Ahead: Will XRP Break Higher? The key level to watch in the coming days remains $3.03. A decisive breakout above this resistance could open the door to higher targets in the $3.10‚Äì$3.20 range. On the downside, support is currently established around $2.97 and $2.92. Sustained volume and bullish momentum would be required to carry XRP beyond its recent highs and toward retesting historical peaks near $3.60. For now, the $33 million volume explosion reported by Xaif stands as a pivotal signal in XRP‚Äôs current market cycle. It reflects not only intense short-term interest but also a possible shift in long-term positioning by major players. title: When Will XRP ETF Be Approved?
body: After months of speculation, the long-anticipated XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) may finally be within reach. Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchunas believes approvals could arrive as early as September or October, sparking excitement across the crypto market. In the middle of this altcoin ETF wave, MAGACOIN FINANCE has emerged as one of the most talked-about projects in crypto, capturing a surge of investor attention as it dominates headline trends. New Rules Clear the Way for XRP ETF The SEC recently introduced a simplified listing framework for crypto ETFs, opening the door to several altcoin funds beyond Bitcoin and Ethereum. One major change is that any digital asset with six months of active futures trading can now be considered for ETF approval. This shift benefits tokens like XRP, Solana, and Dogecoin, all of which meet the requirement. Adding to the momentum, the SEC‚Äôs decision to allow in-kind creation and redemption‚Äîwhere ETF shares are backed and settled using the actual underlying tokens rather than cash‚Äîbrings crypto ETFs closer in structure to gold and other commodity funds. Legal analysts argue that this move cuts costs and makes ETF operations more scalable, improving the likelihood of approval. A New Leader is Being Born While XRP waits for a regulatory breakthrough, MAGACOIN FINANCE is already making waves. The project has quickly climbed to the top of crypto newsfeeds, with investor interest surging across social media and search platforms. Analysts now compare its rising visibility to early moments in the lifecycles of breakout coins like Dogecoin and Solana. This explosion of attention isn‚Äôt just hype‚ÄîMAGACOIN FINANCE‚Äôs ecosystem expansion and consistent demand spike hint at major bullish potential for early participants, who won‚Äôt miss the golden opportunity. Ripple Case Update Could Be the Final Hurdle Although multiple ETF applications for XRP have already been filed‚Äîincluding by Bitwise and Franklin Templeton‚Äîregulatory delays have kept final approval just out of reach. However, that could soon change. The Ripple vs. SEC case, a key factor holding things back, may be close to resolution. Legal insiders say both sides could withdraw appeals before a crucial August 15 update, which would remove a major roadblock. With prediction markets placing the odds of XRP ETF approval at over 85% , investors are watching September and October closely. If the SEC gives the go-ahead, XRP would become one of the first altcoins to gain ETF exposure in U.S. markets. Conclusion: With the SEC easing its stance and the Ripple legal case nearing resolution, XRP‚Äôs ETF moment could finally be near. Meanwhile, MAGACOIN FINANCE continues to gain massive traction, positioning itself as the top altcoin to watch while regulatory winds shift across the industry. title: Trump Explores New Fed Leadership as Powell‚Äôs Term Winds Down
body: Former President Trump has repeatedly criticized Fed Chair Jerome Powell for not lowering interest rates fast enough and has even said he would fire him if possible‚Äîbut current law protects Powell from being removed mid-term. While Powell‚Äôs leadership continues through May 2026, the unexpected resignation of Governor Adriana Kugler opens a seat early in August ‚Äî giving Trump another chance to shape the Fed. Bold Key Points: Trump's frustration stems from the Fed‚Äôs reluctance to make swift cuts amid disappointing labor reports, such as only 73,000 jobs added in July. Institutional safeguards mean the president cannot remove a sitting Fed chair before term-end, preserving Fed independence Possible successors include candidates aligned with Trump‚Äôs rate-cut stance‚Äîsuch as Scott Bessent, Kevin Hassett, Kevin Warsh, and Christopher Waller‚Äîall seen as favoring more aggressive monetary easing. Recent developments, including firing the Bureau of Labor Statistics head over data he deemed inaccurate, alongside Kugler‚Äôs resignation, signal Trump‚Äôs broader push to gain leverage over both economic reporting and monetary policy. Markets have reacted, pricing in potential rate cuts in the coming months.

title: Ethereum Price Analysis: Is ETH Gearing Up for a $4K Breakout?
body: Ethereum has pulled back slightly after tagging the $4,000 resistance level, which capped the recent explosive rally. While the short-term correction shook out late long positions, on-chain data still leans bullish. As we move into August, price action, RSI levels, and supply metrics hint at the next major move. Technical Analysis By ShayanMarkets The Daily Chart ETH‚Äôs daily chart remains structurally bullish despite the recent retracement. After the breakout above the $2,800 resistance level, the price surged past the $3,500 resistance zone, eventually stalling near $4,000. This area aligns with prior swing highs from late 2024 and is acting as strong resistance for now. The asset has now retraced back toward the broken resistance at $3,500, which is being retested as support. The RSI has also cooled from overbought levels and is currently hovering near 56, allowing room for another move up if buyers step in. Moreover, the 100-day moving average is accelerating above the 200-day moving average, confirming a bullish golden cross structure. As a result, momentum remains in favor of the bulls as long as ETH stays above the $3,500 range. If this zone breaks, the next support lies at $2,800 and then $2,500. On the upside, reclaiming $3,700 would open the door for another test of the $4,100 highs. A confirmed breakout above that level could trigger a move toward $4,400‚Äì$4,500. The 4-Hour Chart The 4-hour chart shows ETH breaking down from a rising wedge formation, a pattern often associated with exhaustion after a prolonged rally. After multiple failed attempts to break above $4,000, ETH rolled over and fell toward $3,350 before finding short-term support. The move coincided with a bearish divergence on RSI, signaling weakening momentum before the drop. Since then, the price has formed a local base around $3,350‚Äì$3,500, with the buyers attempting to regain control. For now, ETH is stuck in a short-term range between $3,500 and $3,750. A clean break above this range could trigger another move toward the $4,000 region. However, if the buyers fail to hold the $3,500 area, we might see further downside into the $3,300 or even the $3,100 zone. This is a key area where both the sellers and the buyers are battling for short-term momentum. Onchain Analysis Exchange Supply Ratio The Ethereum Exchange Supply Ratio continues to trend lower, hitting a fresh multi-year low at 0.13. This metric measures the proportion of ETH held on exchanges relative to the total supply. A falling ratio indicates that less ETH is being held on centralized exchanges, suggesting that holders are moving their coins into cold wallets, staking contracts, or custody solutions. It‚Äôs often interpreted as a bullish signal since it reduces the immediate supply available to sell on the open market. This trend has been in place for the past few years and aligns with Ethereum‚Äôs broader shift toward becoming a yield-bearing asset post-Merge. Despite recent price volatility, investors appear to be sticking to a long-term accumulation strategy. With less ETH available on exchanges, even moderate demand could trigger sharp price movements to the upside. Unless this ratio reverses with a sudden inflow of supply back onto exchanges or a futures liquidation cascade occurs, the overall market structure remains bullish from a supply-side perspective. The post Ethereum Price Analysis: Is ETH Gearing Up for a $4K Breakout? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Coinbase's Weak Q2 Is a Blip, Not a Breakdown, Says Benchmark
body: Coinbase‚Äôs (COIN) softer-than-expected second quarter results triggered a sharp Friday sell-off, but Wall Street broker Benchmark says the drop is a buying opportunity, not a red flag. Analyst Mark Palmer reiterated his buy rating and $421 price target. He argued that the exchange's long-term investment case remains intact as the company continues to build foundational crypto infrastructure. The shares are 1.8% higher in early trading Monday, after having closed 16.7% lower on Friday. Benchmark highlights five catalysts supporting its thesis. First, Coinbase's revenue-sharing agreement with Circle on USDC reserves positions it to benefit from stablecoin adoption, especially after the U.S. passed the GENIUS Act. Second, its institutional offerings, including prime brokerage, crypto-as-a-service and derivatives, are well-timed because the CLARITY Act may spur further adoption. Third, the firm is developing a crypto ‚Äúsuper app‚Äù integrating trading, payments, non-fungible tokens (NFTs), decentralized finance (DeFi) and developer tools, a unique product in the U.S. market. Fourth, the integration of decentralized exchanges expands token access beyond centralized listings. Finally, Coinbase‚Äôs estimated $360 million in July transaction revenue, a 44% jump from its monthly average during the second quarter, signals a potential recovery in crypto activity. Benchmark concludes the quarter's miss is short-term noise. Coinbase‚Äôs evolving platform, underpinned by regulation tailwinds and increasing institutional demand, points to long-term growth. title: Nvidia expected to return to China chip market as U.S. ease restrictions
body: Nvidia is set to resume exports of its H20 chips to China after the ban in April. The Trump administration gave the company assurances last month, calling for a new fully compliant made-for-China chip. Analysts from brokerage firm Bernstein believe it will be hard for Nvidia to regain its previous market share, despite hopes of H20s returning to the Chinese market. According to the firm‚Äôs recent report, the tech company‚Äôs AI chip market share in Beijing would fall from 66% in 2024 to 54% in 2025. Nvidia expects a drop in market share despite resuming exports to China Bernstein analysts argued that U.S. export controls have shifted reliance to domestic AI processor vendors in China. The firm noted that domestic vendors such as Huawei , Cambricon, and Hygon are not competing with the most advanced global alternatives. The research firm predicts that local Chinese AI firms will grow from 17% in 2023 to 55% by 2027. The Futurum Group CEO, Daniel Newman, also believes Nvidia‚Äôs market share drop from its customers might have been diverted to Chinese alternatives during the H20 controls. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has been advocating for more access to the Chinese market, arguing that export regulations were limiting U.S. tech leadership. Rera Goujon, director at Rhodium Group, also acknowledged that including U.S. technology companies in the Chinese market can help it grow its geopolitical leverage. The Rhodium Group reported last month that the initiative could see the administration ease its export restrictions to allow U.S. chipmakers greater access to Beijing. Goujon also highlighted that China isn‚Äôt expected to slow its efforts in advocating for companies to use localized AI products. Ray Wang, research director for semiconductors, supply chain, and emerging tech at The Futurum Group, believes that Chinese customers like Bytedance, Baidu, Tencent, and Alibaba still prefer Nvidia‚Äôs AI products. Su Lian Jye, chief analyst at Omdia, maintained that Chinese companies have been purchasing more locally produced chips amid geopolitical tensions. Wang argued that Nvidia‚Äôs growing edge over its Chinese rivals, with advanced hardware with large memory bandwidth, makes it a preferred option. He also noted that the Chinese firm‚Äôs rivalry with Huawei fuels its preference for Nvidia‚Äôs products. H20 chips raise security concerns for both China and the U.S. Lutnick said exports of H20 chips to China pose a national security threat in the wake of the potential resumption of sales to Beijing.. He believes China‚Äôs People‚Äôs Liberation Army could deploy U.S. chips and AI models. ‚ÄúAs policymakers and professionals with a background in national security policy, we believe this move represents a strategic misstep that endangers the United States‚Äô economic and military edge in artificial intelligence (AI). ‚Äì Howard Lutnick , U.S. Secretary of Commerce. Cyberspace Administration of China reported that the U.S. tech giant‚Äôs officials met with Chinese officials last week to discuss national security concerns posed by the H20 chips. There were also concerns that U.S. controls would allow tech firms such as Nvidia to include potential backdoors, making it easy for the U.S. to track them. The CAC expected Nvidia to provide relevant supporting documentation regarding security risks associated with its H20 chips sold to China. The regulator argued that the U.S. tech firm has been reported to contain tracking and remote shutdown technologies. Nvidia refuted claims that its hardware could include security mechanisms and location verification to allow external access or control. Charlie Dai, vice president and principal analyst at advisory firm Forrester Research, believes that such restrictions would lead to Chinese companies temporarily curbing the adoption of U.S.-made chips due to fears of potential vulnerabilities and regulatory uncertainty. U.S. Senator Tom Cotton and other U.S. officials introduced the U.S. Chip Security Act. The legislation would require tech companies such as Nvidia to include security mechanisms and location verification in their chips. title: Massive ETH Holdings: BitMine Immersion‚Äôs $2.9 Billion Ethereum Stash Unveiled
body: BitcoinWorld Massive ETH Holdings: BitMine Immersion‚Äôs $2.9 Billion Ethereum Stash Unveiled In the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, news often arrives with a jolt, reshaping perceptions and strategies. A recent revelation has certainly done just that: BitMine Immersion, a prominent Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin mining firm, has reportedly amassed an astounding sum in ETH holdings , valued at over $2.9 billion. This isn‚Äôt just a large number; it‚Äôs a strategic pivot that demands a closer look. What Are BitMine Immersion‚Äôs Massive ETH Holdings? According to insights shared by Unfolded on X (formerly Twitter), BitMine Immersion now holds more than 833,000 ETH. To put that into perspective, this substantial amount translates to over $2.9 billion, making their ETH holdings a significant component of their overall digital asset portfolio. This news is particularly noteworthy because BitMine Immersion is primarily known for its Bitcoin mining operations. Their deep dive into Ethereum signifies a potentially evolving strategy among major crypto entities. Why Would a Bitcoin Miner Accumulate Such Significant ETH Holdings? The decision by a Bitcoin-focused company to build such substantial ETH holdings sparks curiosity. Several factors could be at play, reflecting a nuanced understanding of the broader crypto market: Diversification Strategy: Relying solely on one asset, even Bitcoin, can expose a company to concentrated risks. By accumulating Ethereum, BitMine Immersion diversifies its digital asset portfolio, potentially hedging against volatility in either asset. Belief in Ethereum‚Äôs Ecosystem: Ethereum is not just a cryptocurrency; it‚Äôs a foundational blockchain for decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and countless decentralized applications (dApps). Holding ETH signifies a strong belief in the long-term growth and utility of the Ethereum ecosystem. Yield Opportunities: Ethereum‚Äôs transition to Proof-of-Stake (PoS) with the Merge introduced staking rewards. Companies with large ETH holdings can stake their assets to earn passive income, adding another revenue stream beyond mining. Market Sentiment and Opportunity: The timing of their accumulation might suggest a bullish outlook on Ethereum‚Äôs future price performance, aiming to capitalize on potential appreciation. What Are the Potential Implications of Such Large ETH Holdings? The accumulation of billions in ETH holdings by a major Bitcoin mining firm carries several implications for both the company and the broader crypto market: Aspect Implication For BitMine Immersion Enhanced balance sheet strength, potential for diversified revenue streams (staking), and increased exposure to the rapidly growing Ethereum ecosystem. For the Crypto Market Signals growing institutional confidence in Ethereum, potentially influencing other firms to diversify. Could contribute to positive market sentiment for ETH. Industry Trends Highlights a potential shift towards multi-asset strategies among crypto companies, moving beyond single-asset focus. While the move offers significant upside, it also exposes the firm to Ethereum‚Äôs inherent price volatility. Managing such substantial ETH holdings requires sophisticated risk management strategies. Actionable Insights for Investors Regarding ETH Holdings This development provides interesting insights for anyone observing the crypto market: Observe Institutional Trends: Keep an eye on how other major players, especially Bitcoin miners, might follow suit in diversifying their portfolios with significant ETH holdings or other altcoins. Research Ethereum‚Äôs Fundamentals: This news reinforces the importance of understanding Ethereum‚Äôs long-term utility, beyond just its price. Its role in DeFi, NFTs, and Web3 remains critical. Consider Diversification: While not financial advice, the principle of diversification demonstrated by BitMine Immersion is a cornerstone of sound investment strategy in any market, including crypto. BitMine Immersion‚Äôs reported $2.9 billion in ETH holdings is more than just a headline; it‚Äôs a powerful statement about the evolving landscape of digital asset investment. It underscores a strategic foresight to embrace diversification and capitalize on the multifaceted growth potential of the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem. As the crypto space matures, we can expect to see more sophisticated asset management strategies emerge, with firms like BitMine Immersion leading the charge into a multi-asset future. How much Ethereum does BitMine Immersion hold? According to recent reports, BitMine Immersion holds over 833,000 ETH, valued at more than $2.9 billion, representing significant ETH holdings . 3. It‚Äôs significant because it indicates a diversification strategy beyond just Bitcoin, showing confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs ecosystem and potential for yield generation through staking, as well as a broader market outlook. 4. Does this mean other Bitcoin miners will also acquire ETH? While not guaranteed, BitMine Immersion‚Äôs move could signal a trend. Other Bitcoin miners might consider similar diversification strategies to mitigate risk and tap into new revenue streams from their ETH holdings . 5. What are the risks associated with large ETH holdings? The primary risk is price volatility. While Ethereum offers growth potential, its value can fluctuate significantly, impacting the overall worth of the ETH holdings . Managing such a large portfolio requires robust risk management. title: Crucial Trump Fed Appointments: What it Means for Crypto‚Äôs Future
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial Trump Fed Appointments: What it Means for Crypto‚Äôs Future The world of finance is abuzz with news that could directly influence the cryptocurrency market. U.S. President Donald Trump is reportedly set to make pivotal Trump Fed appointments , including a new Federal Reserve (Fed) Governor and a Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) chief. This move, as reported by Walter Bloomberg on X, signals a potential shift towards candidates who are ‚Äúrate-cut friendly.‚Äù But what does this mean for your digital assets? Why Do Trump Fed Appointments Matter So Much? When we discuss the Federal Reserve, we‚Äôre talking about the central bank of the United States. Its decisions on interest rates, known as monetary policy, send ripples across the entire global economy. A new Fed Governor, especially one inclined towards lower interest rates, could significantly alter the economic outlook. Similarly, the BLS provides crucial economic data, like inflation and employment figures, which heavily influence Fed decisions. Changes in leadership here could affect how this data is interpreted or even how it‚Äôs presented, indirectly impacting policy. Historically, lower interest rates tend to make traditional investments like bonds less attractive, pushing investors towards riskier assets, including cryptocurrencies, in search of higher returns. This is often referred to as a ‚Äúrisk-on‚Äù environment, making these Trump Fed appointments particularly noteworthy for crypto enthusiasts. What Defines a ‚ÄòRate-Cut Friendly‚Äô Candidate? While specific names haven‚Äôt been confirmed, the term ‚Äúrate-cut friendly‚Äù suggests individuals who believe that current economic conditions warrant lower interest rates, or at least a more cautious approach to rate hikes. This perspective typically aligns with a desire to stimulate economic growth, potentially at the expense of higher inflation. For the Fed, this means potentially reversing the recent trend of interest rate increases. For the BLS, a new chief might emphasize different aspects of labor market data, or perhaps advocate for specific methodologies that could paint a different picture of economic health. The current Fed Governor, Adriana Kugler, would be replaced, and a new BLS chief would take the helm, potentially reshaping the institutional perspectives on economic policy and data reporting. These choices underscore the significance of the upcoming Trump Fed appointments . How Could This Impact Monetary Policy and Crypto? The implications of these potential Trump Fed appointments are multifaceted: Lower Borrowing Costs: If rate-cut friendly candidates are appointed and policy shifts, it could lead to lower borrowing costs for businesses and consumers. This can stimulate economic activity but might also devalue the dollar. Increased Liquidity: A dovish Fed stance often means more money flowing into the system. A portion of this liquidity frequently finds its way into speculative assets like cryptocurrencies. Inflationary Pressures: While stimulating growth, lower rates can also contribute to inflation. Cryptocurrencies, particularly Bitcoin, are sometimes seen as a hedge against inflation due to their decentralized and finite nature. Investor Sentiment: The perception of a more accommodative monetary policy can boost investor confidence in risk assets, potentially leading to increased demand and price appreciation for digital currencies. It‚Äôs important to remember that these are potential outcomes. The actual impact will depend on the individuals appointed, their specific views, and the broader economic landscape following these Trump Fed appointments . What Can Crypto Investors Do Now? As these developments unfold, what can crypto enthusiasts and investors do? Here are a few actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close eye on official announcements regarding these Trump Fed appointments and subsequent statements from the appointees. Monitor Economic Data: Pay attention to inflation reports, employment figures, and GDP growth. These metrics will heavily influence the Fed‚Äôs decisions, regardless of who is in charge. Diversify Your Portfolio: While a rate-cut friendly environment might favor crypto, diversification remains key to managing risk. Understand the Macro Picture: Recognize that crypto markets don‚Äôt exist in a vacuum. They are increasingly intertwined with traditional financial markets and global economic policies. In summary, the rumored Trump Fed appointments could usher in a new era of monetary policy, potentially favoring lower interest rates. This shift could create a more bullish environment for risk assets, including cryptocurrencies, by increasing liquidity and making traditional investments less appealing. However, the exact impact remains to be seen and will depend on the specifics of these crucial appointments. Staying informed and understanding the broader economic context will be paramount for navigating the evolving crypto landscape. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the Federal Reserve (Fed) and why are its appointments important? A1: The Federal Reserve is the central bank of the United States. Its board members, including the Governor, set monetary policy, primarily interest rates. Their decisions directly influence borrowing costs, inflation, and the overall economic environment, which in turn impacts investment markets, including cryptocurrencies. Q2: What does ‚Äúrate-cut friendly‚Äù mean in this context? A2: ‚ÄúRate-cut friendly‚Äù refers to candidates who are inclined to support lower interest rates or a more accommodative monetary policy. This stance typically aims to stimulate economic growth by making borrowing cheaper, but it can also lead to higher inflation. Q3: How might these Trump Fed appointments specifically affect cryptocurrency markets? A3: If rate-cut friendly candidates lead to lower interest rates, traditional investments like bonds may become less attractive. This can push investors towards riskier assets like cryptocurrencies in search of higher returns, potentially increasing demand and prices for digital assets. It can also increase overall market liquidity. Q4: Who is Walter Bloomberg, the source of this information? A4: Walter Bloomberg is a prominent financial news aggregator on the social media platform X (formerly Twitter). He is known for rapidly disseminating market-moving news and reports from various sources, making him a widely followed account for real-time financial updates. As the financial landscape continues to evolve, staying informed is key. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media to help others understand the potential impact of these significant appointments on the crypto world! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency price action . title: Japan-Based Company Metaplanet Continues to Buy Bitcoin! Here's Its Latest BTC Purchase Amount
body: Japan-based Bitcoin treasury firm Metaplanet has increased its holdings by purchasing 463 more Bitcoins (BTC). The purchase brings its total holdings to 17,595 BTC, worth $53.7 million. Metaplanet Maintains 7th Place in Global Rankings with $54 Million Bitcoin Purchase Metaplanet announced today that it completed the latest purchase at an average price of $115,895. According to CEO Simon Gerovich, the company's total BTC holdings are worth approximately $1.78 billion, with an average purchase price of $101,422. This latest investment follows the company's announcement last Friday of a plan to issue 555 billion yen ($3.7 billion) worth of new perpetual preferred shares to support its Bitcoin buying strategy. ‚ÄúOur goal is to have multiple capital raising tools to buy Bitcoin,‚Äù Gerovich said in a post on the X platform on Sunday. ‚ÄúThe mission of the Bitcoin standard is to continuously increase the amount of Bitcoin per share. Issuing perpetual preferred shares is an extremely useful tool for maximizing long-term shareholder value,‚Äù he said. According to Bitcointreasuries data, Metaplanet holds the seventh-largest Bitcoin holding globally, with 17,595 BTC. It is ahead of MicroStrategy, Marathon Digital (MARA), XXI, Bitcoin Standard Treasury Company, Riot Platforms, and Trump Media. *This is not investment advice. title: Ethereum To Break All-Time Highs in Coming Months, Predicts Analyst Benjamin Cowen ‚Äì Here‚Äôs When
body: A widely followed crypto analyst says that Ethereum ( ETH ) looks set to reach a new all-time high within the next few months. In a new strategy session, Benjamin Cowen tells his 917,000 YouTube subscribers that the second-largest digital asset by market cap has met his previous criteria of forming a higher macro low, therefore setting it up for an eventual push to new highs. ‚ÄúFor a long time, my bias was that it made sense to fade Ethereum because it was going to bleed against Bitcoin, and it needed to go home. It needed to form a macro higher low. Now, that‚Äôs happened. So, what is my bias now, right? Well, my bias now is that it will make new all-time highs and I‚Äôm going to say no later than December.‚Äù Cowen sees Ethereum hitting its market cycle top before January 2026, with a maximum price tag of $7,500. ‚ÄúI think the top for Ethereum for this market cycle will occur no later than January, and it could very well occur before that. It depends on what happens. So let‚Äôs suppose that Ethereum does go to a new all-time high this cycle and let‚Äôs suppose it happens within the next 5 to 6 months‚Ä¶ We did this whole video on the butterfly effect, where essentially if you go through the butterfly effect, it calls for a price of Ethereum, potentially of $5,300 to as high as $7,500. So, I say that again. $5,300 to $7,500 is a range that would be justified if you believe in that butterfly harmonic pattern that we‚Äôve been following for a while.‚Äù The butterfly effect refers to a harmonic pattern Cohen believes Ethereum is following, one that leads to a cycle top and an ensuing bear market. Ethereum is trading for $3,499 at time of writing, a 3% increase during the last 24 hours. body: BitcoinWorld Binance Alpha Listing: Unlocking New Horizons with DARKSTAR Get ready for some exciting news in the crypto space! The digital asset world is buzzing with the latest development from Binance Alpha. According to JinSe Finance, Binance Alpha has officially listed DarkStar (DARKSTAR), a move that‚Äôs set to open up new avenues for traders and potentially boost the project‚Äôs visibility. This Binance Alpha listing marks a significant moment, bringing DarkStar to a wider audience and integrating it into one of the industry‚Äôs prominent platforms. What Does the Binance Alpha Listing of DARKSTAR Mean? Binance Alpha, known for its robust trading environment and diverse asset offerings, serves as a crucial gateway for many cryptocurrency projects seeking broader market exposure. Its listings are often seen as a stamp of approval, indicating a project‚Äôs potential and adherence to certain standards. The recent Binance Alpha listing of DarkStar (DARKSTAR) is a testament to this, signaling its readiness for increased liquidity and investor interest. For DarkStar, this transformative event means: Enhanced Visibility: Being listed on a platform like Binance Alpha instantly puts DarkStar in front of a massive global user base, expanding its reach significantly. Increased Liquidity: More traders mean more trading volume, which typically leads to better price discovery and easier entry/exit for investors, improving market efficiency. Credibility Boost: Listings on reputable exchanges like Binance Alpha often lend an air of legitimacy and trust to a project, attracting more serious investors and fostering confidence. Why is this Binance Alpha Listing a Game-Changer for DARKSTAR? The impact of a major exchange listing can be profound, and this particular Binance Alpha listing is no exception. JinSe Finance, a respected source in the crypto media landscape, confirmed this development, lending further weight to its significance. For DarkStar, this isn‚Äôt just another listing; it‚Äôs a strategic leap forward. It positions DARKSTAR within a more liquid and active trading environment, potentially accelerating its development and community growth. Consider these pivotal aspects: Market Access: Binance Alpha provides a streamlined interface and advanced tools that cater to both novice and experienced traders, making DARKSTAR more accessible to a wider demographic. Community Growth: Exposure on such a platform can attract new community members, developers, and potential partners, fostering a more vibrant and active ecosystem around DarkStar. Future Prospects: A successful listing can pave the way for further integrations, partnerships, and even future listings on other top-tier exchanges, amplifying DarkStar‚Äôs reach and long-term potential. However, it‚Äôs also important to remember that while a listing provides immense opportunity, the market remains dynamic. Volatility can still be a factor, and sustained growth depends on the project‚Äôs fundamentals, ongoing development, and overall market conditions. How Can Traders Capitalize on the Binance Alpha Listing ? For traders, the Binance Alpha listing of DarkStar presents a fresh set of opportunities. As with any new listing, careful consideration and strategic planning are key. Here are some actionable insights: Research Thoroughly: Before diving in, take the time to understand DarkStar‚Äôs whitepaper, use case, team, and tokenomics. Knowledge is power in the crypto markets. Monitor Market Sentiment: Observe how the market reacts to the listing. Initial price pumps followed by corrections are common. Look for sustainable interest and genuine demand. Risk Management: Allocate only what you can afford to lose. New listings can be highly volatile, so setting stop-loss orders and taking profits at predetermined levels can help manage risk effectively. Stay Updated: Follow DarkStar‚Äôs official channels and Binance Alpha‚Äôs announcements for any further developments, trading pair additions, or community initiatives. The key is to approach this new opportunity with a balanced perspective, combining excitement with prudent trading practices and a clear understanding of market dynamics. The Binance Alpha listing of DarkStar (DARKSTAR) is undoubtedly a significant milestone for the project and an exciting development for the broader cryptocurrency community. As reported by JinSe Finance, this move not only enhances DarkStar‚Äôs visibility and liquidity but also reinforces Binance Alpha‚Äôs position as a key player in facilitating access to promising digital assets. While the crypto market always carries inherent risks, this listing opens up new avenues for engagement and investment, making DarkStar a project to watch closely in the coming months. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Binance Alpha? Binance Alpha is a specialized trading platform, part of the Binance ecosystem, designed to offer a robust environment for trading various digital assets, often featuring new or niche cryptocurrencies. What is DarkStar (DARKSTAR)? DarkStar (DARKSTAR) is a cryptocurrency project that has recently been listed on Binance Alpha. Its specific utility and technology would be detailed in its official whitepaper and project documentation, which potential investors should review. When did DarkStar get listed on Binance Alpha? According to JinSe Finance, DarkStar (DARKSTAR) has been officially listed on Binance Alpha. The exact date and time would be found in Binance Alpha‚Äôs official listing announcements. What are the primary benefits of this Binance Alpha listing for DarkStar? The listing provides DarkStar with enhanced visibility, increased liquidity, and a significant boost in credibility by being available on a prominent platform like Binance Alpha, potentially attracting more investors and users. How can I trade DARKSTAR on Binance Alpha? To trade DARKSTAR on Binance Alpha, you would typically need to create an account, complete the necessary verification processes (KYC), deposit funds, and then navigate to the DARKSTAR trading pair within the exchange‚Äôs interface to place orders. title: Robert Kiyosaki Hopes Bitcoin Drops to $90K in August: Here‚Äôs Why
body: As bitcoin (BTC) hovers around $114,000, some financial market experts are hoping that it will drop below the $100,000 price mark this month. This way, they can accumulate even bigger bags of the apex cryptocurrency. Renowned author Robert Kiyosaki is one of those nurturing this idea. He noted in a recent tweet that he expects BTC to drop to as low as $90,000. His speculation is not far-fetched, as bitcoin has historically plummeted significantly every August. What Could Trigger BTC Dump? According to on-chain data from the blockchain analytics platform CoinGlass, bitcoin has recorded severe price declines in most Augusts since 2014. For instance, the leading cryptocurrency lost over 13% of its value in August 2022. It also experienced an 11.29% price drop in August 2023. Although last year‚Äôs price decrease was less than the earlier years, the cryptocurrency saw an 8.6% price decrease. Tagging this historical price decline as the ‚ÄúBitcoin August Curse,‚Äù Kiyosaki explained that he is ready to bolster his BTC stash by 2x if the historical price decline occurs. Highlighting what could trigger the dump this month, the renowned author pointed to the United States government. ‚ÄúThe problem is not Bitcoin. The real problem is our multi trillion dollar debt and incompetent PhDs running ‚Äúthe SWAMP‚Äù the Fed and our Treasury,‚Äù he said. According to Kiyosaki, the government has minimal knowledge about Bitcoin and the broader crypto industry. As a result, their decisions, which affect the U.S. financial market, can have a ripple effect on digital assets like BTC. Ending his tweet on a good note, Kiyosaki stated that bitcoin‚Äôs sudden drop to as low as $90,000 will make those who invest in the cryptocurrency richer. BTC Trades Around $114K On July 14th, BTC recorded a new all-time high (ATH) above $123,000. This price pump was fueled by various events, such as the steady BTC treasury strategy implemented by public companies. Since then, however, the leading cryptocurrency has dropped substantially as it dipped below $112,000 during the weekend. Although it has recovered some ground, it‚Äôs still more than 6% away from its peak value, with a current valuation of $114,500. The post Robert Kiyosaki Hopes Bitcoin Drops to $90K in August: Here‚Äôs Why appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Bitcoin: Strategy‚Äôs Astonishing $2.46 Billion Acquisition Reshapes Market
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin: Strategy‚Äôs Astonishing $2.46 Billion Acquisition Reshapes Market In the dynamic world of digital assets, major moves by institutional players often send ripples across the market. A recent report has unveiled an astonishing development: ‚ÄúStrategy,‚Äù a prominent entity, has reportedly made a colossal Bitcoin acquisition , signaling a potentially transformative shift in institutional engagement with cryptocurrencies. This isn‚Äôt just another purchase; it‚Äôs a statement. What Fuels This Colossal Bitcoin Acquisition? According to data from Solid Intel on X, ‚ÄúStrategy‚Äù executed a monumental Bitcoin acquisition between July 28 and August 3. The firm reportedly acquired a staggering 21,021 Bitcoin (BTC) for an eye-watering $2.46 billion. This translates to an average purchase price of approximately $117,256 per BTC. This reported average price point is notably high, highlighting either an exceptionally aggressive accumulation strategy or a unique market dynamic during the acquisition period. Such a substantial investment at this valuation underscores a profound conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value, irrespective of short-term market fluctuations. Let‚Äôs break down the scale of this move: Quantity: 21,021 BTC ‚Äì A significant chunk of Bitcoin‚Äôs circulating supply, especially for a single entity. Total Value: $2.46 billion ‚Äì A multi-billion dollar commitment, placing it among the largest corporate or institutional crypto holdings reported to date. Average Price: ~$117,256 ‚Äì An unprecedented price point for Bitcoin, suggesting either a premium paid for rapid accumulation or a specific strategic intent. The Strategic Implications of Such a Massive Bitcoin Acquisition A Bitcoin acquisition of this magnitude carries profound implications for both the acquiring entity and the broader crypto market. For ‚ÄúStrategy,‚Äù this move could represent a strategic hedge against inflation, a diversification of treasury assets, or a bold bet on the future of digital finance. Benefits for the Acquiring Entity: Inflation Hedge: Bitcoin is often seen as ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù a store of value that can protect against currency debasement. Growth Potential: Despite its volatility, Bitcoin has demonstrated significant long-term growth potential, offering a new avenue for capital appreciation. Market Signal: Such a large purchase sends a powerful signal to other institutions and investors, potentially encouraging further adoption. Potential Challenges: Volatility Exposure: Holding a significant amount of BTC means exposure to its inherent price swings, which can be substantial. Regulatory Landscape: The evolving global regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies could impact the value and liquidity of such large holdings. Security Risks: Managing and securing billions of dollars in digital assets requires robust and sophisticated security protocols. What Does This Bitcoin Acquisition Mean for the Market? This colossal Bitcoin acquisition by ‚ÄúStrategy‚Äù is more than just a company balance sheet adjustment; it‚Äôs a testament to the growing mainstream acceptance and institutional conviction in Bitcoin. When entities commit billions, it often catalyzes broader market sentiment and activity. Impact Area Description Institutional Confidence Validates Bitcoin as a legitimate and viable asset class for large-scale investment, potentially paving the way for more corporate treasury allocations. Supply Dynamics Removing such a large quantity of BTC from the open market can create a supply squeeze, especially if accumulation continues, potentially influencing price upwards. Market Legitimacy Reinforces Bitcoin‚Äôs status as a serious financial asset, attracting more traditional investors and financial products. Precedent Setting Establishes a precedent for other large corporations or investment funds considering similar moves, potentially triggering a domino effect. While the average purchase price of $117,256 stands out as particularly high compared to historical Bitcoin prices, it could signify a strategic decision to acquire a substantial position rapidly, prioritizing volume over a lower average cost basis, or perhaps an aggregated cost over a very specific, short timeframe. The reported Bitcoin acquisition by ‚ÄúStrategy‚Äù marks a significant moment in the cryptocurrency landscape. It underscores the accelerating trend of institutional adoption and the belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs enduring value proposition. Whether this move is a harbinger of even greater corporate interest or an isolated, yet impactful, strategic play, it undeniably adds another fascinating chapter to Bitcoin‚Äôs journey towards mainstream financial integration. As the digital asset space continues to evolve, such bold investments will undoubtedly shape its future trajectory. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the significance of Strategy‚Äôs Bitcoin acquisition? A1: This acquisition is significant due to its immense size ($2.46 billion for 21,021 BTC), signaling strong institutional confidence in Bitcoin as a long-term asset and potentially influencing broader market sentiment and adoption. Q2: What was the average price paid for Bitcoin in this acquisition? A2: According to Solid Intel on X, Strategy acquired the Bitcoin at an average price of approximately $117,256 per BTC. This figure is notably higher than historical Bitcoin market prices, suggesting a unique or aggressive acquisition strategy. Q3: How does such a large Bitcoin acquisition impact the market? A3: A large acquisition can reduce the circulating supply of Bitcoin, validate its legitimacy as an asset class for other institutions, and potentially contribute to positive market sentiment and price appreciation due to increased demand. Q4: Is this the largest institutional Bitcoin holding? A4: While ‚ÄúStrategy‚Äù is a specific entity mentioned in the report, this acquisition of 21,021 BTC for $2.46 billion places it among the most substantial reported institutional holdings, similar to those of companies like MicroStrategy, which have consistently accumulated Bitcoin. Q5: Why would an entity pay such a high average price for Bitcoin? A5: An entity might pay a high average price to rapidly acquire a large position, prioritizing the speed and volume of accumulation over achieving the lowest possible cost. It could also reflect a very strong long-term conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs future value, or an aggregation of purchases over a specific, perhaps volatile, period. Did this monumental Bitcoin acquisition capture your attention? Share your thoughts and this article with your network on social media! Let‚Äôs discuss the future of institutional investment in cryptocurrencies together. title: Coinbase: High Platform Profitability
body: Summary Coinbase's 17% share price drop on Friday is an overreaction to broader market weakness, not company fundamentals, and presents a long-term buying opportunity. Coinbase's Q2'25 earnings showed strong platform profitability, despite a revenue miss, with the company beating EPS estimates and maintaining robust net earnings. Regulatory clarity from the GENIUS Act strengthens the investment case for Coinbase by legitimizing stablecoins and the broader crypto ecosystem. Coinbase remains a high-risk, high-reward play best suited for investors comfortable with volatility and seeking exposure to the fast-growing crypto sector. Coinbase Global, Inc.'s ( COIN ) shares tumbled almost 17% on Friday, after the crypto company‚Äôs second quarter earnings report card disappointed and fell short of expectations regarding the top line, although the top-line miss was fairly small. In my opinion, investors were overreacting to the Q2'25 earnings scorecard since Coinbase remained widely profitable in the second quarter. Most likely, Coinbase's shares crashed after poor jobs numbers were released and investors went into a risk-off setting. In my opinion, the price drop represents an engagement opportunity for investors with a long-term investment horizon and who want to gain investment exposure to the broader, rapidly developing cryptocurrency universe. Data by YCharts Previous Rating I rated shares of Coinbase a strong buy in my last work on the cryptocurrency trading platform in November 2024 -- A Directional Bitcoin Bet -- due to a considerable price recovery in the world‚Äôs largest digital currency, Bitcoin USD ( BTC-USD ). In my opinion, recent legislation with regard to the GENIUS Act, which creates regulatory certainty around stablecoin issuers, has significantly improved the legitimacy of cryptocurrency-based business models. Since Coinbase remained highly profitable in the second quarter, I see the drop as a buying opportunity. Coinbase Q2'25 Earnings Vs. Estimate Performance Coinbase reported better-than-expected earnings for its second quarter, but missed on the top line: the cryptocurrency trading platform reported $5.14 per share in adjusted earnings, beating the consensus estimate by a massive $3.65 per share. Revenues were reported at $1.5B and missed the average prediction by $97M. Seeking Alpha Coinbase's 17% price crash on Friday, in my opinion, was not so much driven by the company‚Äôs earnings scorecard for the second fiscal quarter but rather by emerging selling pressure in the market related to a poor jobs report that stated that the U.S. economy only created 73,000 jobs in July , missing the estimate of 100,000. Investors rushed to sell assets which led to falling prices in both the stock market and the crypto market. The unemployment rate also ticked up to 4.2% in the month of July, causing selling pressure in the stock market more generally. Major stock market indices, like the Dow Jones, sold off following the jobs report, leading to broad-based pressure on risk assets. While Coinbase's Q2'25 earnings scorecard was not bad at all, the weak market environment likely led to a much more serious sell-off than would be justified based on the platform's financial performance, in my opinion. CNBC From a purely financial standpoint, however, Coinbase had a fairly successful second quarter. In the second quarter, the cryptocurrency trading platform achieved revenues of $1.5B, showing 3% year-over-year growth. On a sequential basis, however, the firm's revenues dropped 26% as both institutional and retail clients traded less throughout the quarter. Transaction volumes can be highly volatile from quarter to quarter and have not, in the long term, negatively affected Coinbase's platform profitability. Investors with a long-term investment horizon may want to look past the volatility of short-term driving trading activity and focus on the fact that Coinbase develops non-trading related revenue streams that are set to reduce the company's overall revenue volatility. Transaction revenues are key to the company's financial success as they continue to represent the majority of Coinbase's top line. In Q2'25, Coinbase‚Äôs transaction revenues fell to $764.3M, showing a decline of 2% year-over-year, but a much more significant 39% drop-off quarter-over-quarter. Transaction revenues represented 51% of all revenues in Q2'25, so the decline in transaction revenue was quite significant, and the driving factor behind Coinbase underperforming top-line estimates. Even much higher stablecoin revenue, which came in at $332.5M (+38% Y/Y) could not compensate for the decline in transaction activity. Coinbase Coinbase has a reputation for having a volatile revenue trajectory that depends on the trading volume of both retail and institutional investors on the platform: the firm's Q2'25 trading volume decreased 40% Q/Q to $237B, as institutional investors pulled back from investing at a time when Bitcoin marched on to reach new all-time highs. Further, Coinbase reduced prices for stablecoin trading pairs in the second quarter which affected the company's total transaction volume and revenue generation from this specific revenue stream. In the long term, I expect that investors will see top-line growth, especially in the stablecoin revenue portion of Coinbase's portfolio. While the cryptocurrency marketplace suffered a considerable decline in transaction volumes from both retail and institutional investors in the second quarter, the marketplace remained extremely profitable from a net earnings perspective. In Q2'25, Coinbase generated $1.4B in earnings from its mainly trading and complementary services, showing a near 39-fold increase over the year-earlier period. Coinbase's massive platform profitability is still the main reason why I believe that shares are a strong buy. Coinbase Besides strong platform profitability, I believe that new legislation in the context of the recently passed GENIUS Act is a positive catalyst for growing cryptocurrency adoption. The GENIUS Act is a major piece of pro-crypto regulation that provides regulatory clarity for stablecoin issuers and therefore also further legitimizes the cryptocurrency ecosystem. Stablecoins are an important pillar of the cryptocurrency market because they allow investors to move in and out of more volatile cryptocurrencies easily and at a low cost, and their values are pegged to the U.S. Dollar. As a result, a more favorable cryptocurrency investment environment is a huge boost to companies like Coinbase which are playing an active role in the development of the cryptocurrency ecosystem and are seeing growth especially in the stablecoin portion of their businesses. While the stablecoin legislation didn't yet affect the firm's Q2'25 results (the legislation was passed in July), it is a favorable element for the Coinbase investment case long-term. Coinbase participates in the growth of the stablecoin segment as it has a revenue-sharing agreement with Circle Internet Group, Inc. ( CRCL ), the issuer of stablecoin USDC. This agreement allows the company to keep 100% of revenues associated with USDC held on the Coinbase platform as well as 50% of income associated with off-platform USDC holdings. Stablecoin issues like Circle can partner with cryptocurrency exchanges in order to boost the adoption of specific stablecoins, in this case, USDC. If USDC stablecoin adoption rises, cryptocurrency platforms can generate higher interest income associated with the reserve assets underlying stablecoins (often U.S. Treasuries). The relationship between stablecoin issuer (Circle) and cryptoexchange (Coinbase) is illustrated in the following chart. Coinbase Going forward, investors should expect Coinbase to continue to diversify its revenue mix by developing its non-trading related revenue streams, such as stablecoin revenue, Blockchain rewards or interest-related income. Coinbase's Valuation Coinbase has, as a result of unpredictable trading volumes on its trading platform, a very volatile EPS record. While predicting earnings on a Q/Q basis can be tricky, I expect the cryptocurrency trading platform to benefit from growing crypto adoption long-term and be able to grow its earnings as well. Coinbase generated $5.39 per share in diluted earnings in the first six months of the year. Assuming that America's pro-crypto regulatory push continues and Bitcoin stages a new breakout attempt, I would not be surprised to see a considerable rebound in transaction activity on the Coinbase platform. I believe that Coinbase could generate $11-12 per share in earnings in FY 2025 which rests on the assumption that cryptocurrency markets will remain volatile throughout the second half of the year. For FY 2026, I would expect a similar level of earnings, but I could see a potential retest of Coinbase's previous EPS record of $14.50/share in FY 2021 if investor sentiment surges and Bitcoin achieves a series of new all-time highs. Shares of Coinbase are currently trading at a forward price-to-earnings ratio of 38.4X which is about 24% above the 1-year average price-to-earnings ratio. Firms with cryptocurrency exposure, like MicroStrategy Incorporated ( MSTR ) and Circle Internet Group, are trading at P/E ratios ranging from 12.2X to 93.3X. While both companies have different business orientations than Coinbase -- Strategy is mainly a Bitcoin holder conducting debt-financed Bitcoin purchases while Circle is a stablecoin issuer -- all companies participate in the broader growth of the crypto universe and their financial fortunes are tied to the performance of the cryptocurrency market in general. Further, all companies are set to benefit financially from growing cryptocurrency/stablecoin adoption and an improving regulatory landscape that will make investments in digital assets easier going forward. FY 2026 EPS estimates for Coinbase, due to Bitcoin's surge earlier this year, have consistently reset higher in 2025 and I would not be surprised to see Coinbase post record, trading-driven results if cryptocurrencies surge again. An $11-12 per share EPS estimate for FY 2025 (and FY 2026), even when using a lower 31.0X P/E ratio (Coinbase's average in the last twelve months), calculates to a fair value between $341 to $372 per share. Using the current forward P/E ratio of 38.4X, this estimated EPS range would yield a fair value of $422-461 per share. Data by YCharts Risks With Coinbase The risk of negative regulatory actions against crypto companies has decreased significantly under the Trump administration, although cryptocurrencies are still a high-risk asset class and are only suitable for investors who can withstand significant price volatility. High volatility and potential hacks of cryptocurrency platforms or wallets are also key risks that investors should have in mind when investing in the cryptocurrency space. What would change my mind about Coinbase, and potentially my stock rating, is if the platform were to see an exodus of client assets or significantly suppressed earnings power during a major correction in the cryptocurrency market. Final Thoughts The market is wrong for punishing Coinbase so harshly after a relatively small top-line miss. The 17% Coinbase share price drop on Friday, in my opinion, was completely exaggerated and likely had much more to do with poor jobs numbers and a desire for investors to sell assets that have performed very well lately. In my opinion, the drop is a buying opportunity for investors with a high risk tolerance that have a desire to gain exposure to the fast-developing cryptocurrency market. The main reason to own Coinbase is the company's enormous platform profitability. Investors with a long-term investment horizon and an ability to stomach high levels of volatility may want to consider buying the drop aggressively.

title: Baidu sets sight on Europe expansion with AV ride-hailing partnership with Lyft
body: Baidu is pushing into Europe. The Chinese tech company plans to launch its driverless taxis in the U.K. and Germany starting 2026 through a new deal with Lyft. It‚Äôs Baidu‚Äôs big move in Europe as it tries to grow its autonomous vehicle business outside China. The two companies said they want to expand to ‚Äúthousands‚Äù of robotaxis across Europe in the ‚Äúfollowing years,‚Äù but they‚Äôre still waiting on regulators. The vehicles won‚Äôt hit the streets until government agencies in those countries sign off. No word yet on how the rides will be booked, whether through the FreeNow app, another app, or something new. Lyft takes over FreeNow to enter Europe Lyft just stepped into Europe after being absent for years. Last week, the U.S.-based company closed its acquisition of FreeNow, a ride-hailing business based in Germany. FreeNow already operates in over 150 cities across nine countries, including Ireland, the U.K., France, and Germany. That gave Lyft immediate access to a customer base and infrastructure in places where it had zero presence before. The new Baidu-Lyft deal builds on that, the latter‚Äôs way of entering the self-driving space in Europe fast, without having to build the tech itself. And it puts Lyft in direct competition with companies already trying autonomous rides in Europe, like Uber and Bolt. Lyft and Baidu said Monday that regulatory approval is still pending, which means they can‚Äôt actually start operating yet. But the plan is to roll out as soon as it‚Äôs legal to do so in those markets. Baidu makes a big push into global markets The launch won‚Äôt be Baidu‚Äôs first international partnership. Just last month, the Chinese firm signed a different deal with Uber. That agreement lets Baidu bring its self-driving vehicles to Uber‚Äôs platform outside the U.S. and mainland China, focusing mainly on Asia and the Middle East. In China, Baidu already has a functioning robotaxi service called Apollo Go, which has been running since 2021. People in cities like Beijing can hail these cars through an app, and they‚Äôve been operating without drivers in multiple areas. Ride-hailing companies have been betting big on autonomous driving lately. Most of them, like Lyft and Uber, aren‚Äôt building the cars themselves. Instead, they‚Äôre teaming up with companies like Baidu, Wayve, or Aurora to bring the tech into their platforms. In the U.K., where Lyft is now pushing, Uber has also made a move. Earlier this year, Uber started working with British self-driving startup Wayve. That deal is set to bring fully autonomous rides to the streets sometime in spring 2026, almost the same time Baidu plans to begin its rollout. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

title: Coinbase: Unlocking a Remarkable COIN Stock Investment Opportunity
body: BitcoinWorld Coinbase: Unlocking a Remarkable COIN Stock Investment Opportunity The world of cryptocurrencies often brings exciting highs and challenging dips. Recently, investors have watched Coinbase , a leading crypto exchange , experience a notable dip in its share price. However, a prominent voice from the financial sector, Benchmark, views this as a significant investment opportunity for Coinbase (COIN stock) investors. They have confidently reiterated a $421 price target and a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating, suggesting strong belief in its long-term trajectory. This perspective encourages a deeper look beyond immediate market fluctuations. Why is Benchmark Bullish on Coinbase COIN Stock? Benchmark‚Äôs unwavering stance on Coinbase COIN stock sends a strong signal to the market. Despite the company‚Äôs Q2 results showing some weaknesses, the firm emphasizes that Coinbase‚Äôs fundamental long-term growth outlook remains firmly intact. This confidence highlights a strategic focus on future potential rather than just immediate performance. The analyst firm‚Äôs belief stems from several key factors that underpin Coinbase‚Äôs future prospects. They anticipate these elements will continue to drive the company‚Äôs valuation upwards, even as the broader market for digital assets navigates its own challenges. Driving Forces Behind the Crypto Exchange‚Äôs Potential What exactly makes Benchmark so optimistic about this leading crypto exchange ? Several core drivers are highlighted as pivotal to Coinbase‚Äôs continued success and its status as a compelling investment opportunity : USDC Revenue-Sharing: A significant and growing revenue stream derived from its partnership with USD Coin (USDC), a stablecoin. Institutional Demand: Increasing interest and adoption from large institutional players, bringing substantial capital and trading volume to the platform. Crypto ‚ÄúSuper App‚Äù Development: The ongoing evolution towards a comprehensive platform offering a wide range of services, aiming to be a one-stop shop for digital assets . DEX Integration: The strategic move to integrate decentralized exchange functionalities, expanding its reach and offerings to a broader user base. July Trading Revenue Jump: A notable 44% increase in trading revenue during July, indicating resilience and renewed activity even in a challenging quarter for the crypto market. These factors collectively paint a picture of a robust business model that is actively diversifying its income streams and expanding its market footprint. Navigating the Digital Assets Landscape: An Investment Opportunity? The volatile nature of the digital assets market can be daunting for many investors. Yet, seasoned analysts like Benchmark often identify dips as moments of potential. title: Crypto Sprint Kicks Off as CFTC and SEC Race Toward Reform
body: The CFTC‚Äôs ‚ÄúProject Crypto‚Äù was announced by Acting Chair Caroline Pham, and its main goal is to implement key recommendations from a Trump executive order, including clarifying crypto classifications, integrating decentralized finance (DeFi) entities into existing frameworks, and collaborating with other agencies on joint rulemaking and innovation sandboxes. Meanwhile, SEC Chair Paul Atkins is spearheading a ‚Äúreshoring‚Äù push to attract crypto businesses back to the US. This pro-crypto pivot already drove major players like Nexo, OKX, Bitmain, and Kraken to expand or relocate operations in the US. US Crypto Sprint Gains Speed The US Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) launched an ambitious ‚Äúcrypto sprint‚Äù that is specifically aimed at implementing key crypto-related recommendations that were issued by the Trump administration last week. Acting CFTC Chair Caroline Pham announced the initiative, known as ‚ÄúProject Crypto,‚Äù on Friday and said that the agency is committed to fulfilling President Trump‚Äôs directive to establish the United States as a global leader in cryptocurrency innovation. The initiative will be carried out in close coordination with Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair Paul Atkins and Commissioner Hester Peirce. The push stems from an executive order that was issued by Trump in January, which led to the formation of a Working Group on Digital Asset Markets. This group has since released a report outlining 18 recommendations, two of which directly apply to the CFTC. These include developing new guidance on classifying cryptocurrencies as commodities, setting registration standards for decentralized finance (DeFi) entities, and exploring the integration of crypto into the current regulatory framework for entities already overseen by the CFTC. Another recommendation calls for updating rules to support blockchain-based derivatives. The remaining recommendations involve collaborative efforts with other financial agencies, particularly the SEC and the Treasury. These include creating a joint rulemaking process to provide clear regulatory guidance and potentially launching a regulatory sandbox for crypto innovation. A longer-term objective is to allow regulated firms to offer a range of services through unified digital platforms. Additionally, the report calls on Congress to clarify the division of responsibilities between the CFTC and the SEC. It specifically proposes that the CFTC be granted explicit authority to oversee spot markets for non-security digital assets. Pham stated that the CFTC has already taken meaningful steps toward crypto regulatory clarity. This includes engaging directly with crypto industry leaders and repealing outdated guidance that no longer reflects the digital asset industry. The agency also concluded consultations regarding 24/7 trading for derivatives and the introduction of perpetual contracts, which received support from various people in the crypto industry. CFTC withdrawing Staff Advisory No. 23-07 earlier this year Adding momentum to these efforts, President Trump nominated Brian Quintenz to lead the CFTC. However, his nomination hearing was recently postponed at the request of the White House, leaving his confirmation pending. Overall, the CFTC‚Äôs regulatory push could have profound implications for the US crypto landscape. Atkins Leads Crypto Reshoring Push Meanwhile, crypto companies are making a return to the United States as federal officials create a much friendlier regulatory environment. In a speech that was delivered Thursday at the America First Policy Institute, SEC Chair Paul Atkins urged the country to ‚Äúreshore the crypto businesses that fled,‚Äù which also forms part of President Donald Trump‚Äôs strategy to reestablish the US as a leading global hub for cryptocurrency innovation. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent echoed this sentiment the next day by declaring that the nation has entered the ‚Äúgolden age of crypto.‚Äù He also encouraged entrepreneurs to launch their projects and hire talent in the country. This policy pivot already began to produce tangible outcomes. Companies that previously scaled back or moved offshore are now either returning or expanding their US operations. In late April, Bulgaria-based Nexo announced its reentry into the American market after years of absence, and openly attributed the move to improved regulatory clarity. Soon after, Netherlands-based derivatives exchange Deribit was reportedly eyeing a US launch, while London‚Äôs Wintermute, a leading algorithmic trading firm, opened a New York office. The trend continued in June, when Seychelles-based centralized exchange OKX relaunched in the US and established a new headquarters in San Jose, California, after a $500 million settlement with American regulators. In July, Chinese mining giant Bitmain revealed plans to open its first US-based ASIC production facility by early 2026 and said it will set up a new US headquarters by the end of the third quarter, likely in Texas or Florida. This followed earlier reports that other major mining companies like Canaan and MicroBT are also relocating production operations to the US. HQ relocation announcement from Kraken Domestic firms are also seizing the moment. Kraken moved its global headquarters to Wyoming in June, due to the state‚Äôs supportive regulatory landscape. Meanwhile, MoonPay, which was originally based in Miami, relocated to New York and announced in June that it secured licenses to operate in all 50 states. Together, these developments prove that there is a growing confidence in the US as a viable and supportive environment for the crypto industry‚Äôs next phase of growth.
